item.title: Bip39: How mnemonics are generated
item.description: So you just created a new wallet using metamask, ledger-live or other similar software and at some point you got asked to securely store a 12 word sentence like the one below (Don’t worry, I won’t use that mnemonic ðŸ˜‰). In this example the mnemonic is elite desk hockey kick music menu north behind express protect coach hamster but have you ever wondered how these sentences are generated? What is a mnemonic?
